alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Barrow and southern Jackson Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Arcade to near County Line, and moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Winder, Jefferson, Arcade, Nicholson, and County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
